list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large piece of woolen or similar material used as a bed covering or other covering for warmth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I slept on the ground covered by my blanket
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã ngủ trên mặt đất được bao phủ bởi chăn của tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a rubber surface used for transferring the image in ink from the plate to the paper in offset printing.
covering all cases or instances; total and inclusive.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a blanket ban on tobacco advertising
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một lệnh cấm chăn trên quảng cáo thuốc lá

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover completely with a thick layer of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the countryside was blanketed in snow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nông thôn được phủ đầy tuyết
